titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BLOOD GLUCOSE CONCENTRATION (ON ADMISSION TO NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) - Description

div.p: BLOOD GLUCOSE CONCENTRATION (ON ADMISSION TO NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) is the result of the Clinical Investigation which measures the baby's Blood Glucose Concentration, where the UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is 'Millimoles per litre (mmol/L)', on admission to neonatal critical care.
The value is presented in the range 0.0 - 50.0.
